snippet: DAVIS--Ed. The Board of Directors and staff of The New Press mourn the death of our brilliant, generous, loyal, and endlessly kind friend Ed Davis. We extend our deepest sympathy to Tom and the rest of Ed's family. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: DAVIS--Ed. The Board of Directors and staff of The New Press mourn the death of our brilliant, generous, loyal, and endlessly kind friend Ed Davis. We extend our deepest sympathy to Tom and the rest of Ed's family. 1/3
